function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Overreliance on single-model performance without considering the context and limitations of other detection models","category":"Modeling and prediction risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Change in computation method for ap by pascal voc challenge may lead to discrepancies in model evaluation.","category":"Modeling and simulation risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of multiple detection models may lead to varied performance results and difficulty in comparing model effectiveness.","category":"Modeling and simulation risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased speed of communication mediums leading to rapid spread of misinformation about diseases.","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collaboration in new ways leading to the spread of unverified research findings or unreliable data.","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Intersection of sonic and textual outputs leading to the misinterpretation of research findings or communication of inaccurate information.","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid rollout of digital tools and packages in the medtech sector.","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Switch from in-person to remote consultation methods in healthcare.","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid navigation of governance and digital integration for digital care processes.","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on technology for identifying social distancing violations may lead to errors in detection and interpretation of human behaviors.","category":"Artificial intelligence and machine learning risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Training on a large number of samples from the google open images dataset, including human body parts, increases the risk of model overfitting to specific characteristics of that dataset and may not generalize well to other datasets.","category":"Modeling and simulation risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilizing a transfer learning approach with pre-trained models may introduce biases and assumptions from the source dataset microsoft coco into the human detection model, leading to biased predictions and potential fairness issues.","category":"Artificial intelligence and machine learning risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Using stochastic gradient descent sgd with warm restarts and a cosine annealing learning rate schedule may lead to challenges in hyperparameter tuning and model convergence, as well as the need for careful adjustment of learning rate values.","category":"Modeling and prediction risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of complex mathematical equations may lead to errors in implementation or understanding.","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overfitting may occur due to the use of specific techniques such as dropblock and class label smoothing.","category":"Modeling and prediction risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of dense models and multiple layers may increase the complexity of the model, making it harder to train.","category":"Modeling and prediction risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Selection of a backbone architecture with a higher number of parameters may lead to increased complexity and resource requirements.","category":"Modeling and simulation risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of simulation with industry 4.0 creating a digital twin.","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Constant bidirectional flow of information between physical and virtual systems.","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate research on flexible apartment design systems may lead to unsatisfactory living spaces in postcovid-19 housing.","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Less than 50% of relevant electricity loads are metered, leading to poor visibility and control over electricity design and functionalities.","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proper auditing and evaluation of building automation and control systems.","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Evaluation and assessment of building automation and control systems could lead to design flaws that impact performance gaps and suboptimal control systems.","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ad-hoc wireless network may interfere with host building’s existing services or information/communication networks.","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative correlation between aerosol data from satellites and covid-19 fatalities, but positive correlation with infections.","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduced productivity and workforce shortages due to
